playXE opened issue #6132:

Thanks for filing a feature request! Please fill out the TODOs below.

Feature

Rename trap and debugtrap to spanish_inquisition

Benefit

Nobody expects the Spanish Inquisition so this makes sense

Implementation

Just rename fn definitions.

Alternatives

No alternatives
